name: sweeper
description: **How do Sweepers Work?** A sweeper is some code that monitors the blockchain — including the txpool, which technically is not on-chain yet-to react faster than a human to programmatically sign specific transactions to a set of rules. **How Script Works?** THis script listen incoming transactions by ethereum address. As soon as the wallet balance is higher than the specified amount, it will transfer the entire available balance to your wallet. > :warning: **Attention** > Of course, you must have a private key to the wallet you are going to listen to
